caption.p:
( A) Greenland: NGRIP temperature ( 8). ( B) Southern Black Sea: TEX 86 sea temperature core M72-5 ( 10). ( C) South Carpathians: AC stalagmite POM1 δ 13C. ( D) Upper Danube: Willendorf loess/paleosol profile, paleosol ages, age probability density functions (age-pdf), and stratigraphically constrained loess and gley horizons C7-2, C7-3, and C9 ( 22). ( E) East Carpathians: TC stalagmite 1152 δ 18O. ( F) Eifel maar lakes, ELSA dust stack. ( G) Western Massive Central: Villars Cave stalagmites δ 13C ( 25). ( H) Iberian Atlantic margin: TEX 86 sea surface temperature core MD95-2042 ( 17). Numbers indicate Greenland stadials at the end of the respective DO cycle. A map with locations of records is available in
SI Appendix, Fig. S1 .
